bibl.title: [Coin Hoards 2007. Ancient Hoards.] EEF Hoard of Alexandrian Tetradrachms (CH VII, A27).
bibl.note: Description of a hoard found in about 1900 during excavations by the EEF somewhere in Egypt with no further information about the circumstances of find.
bibl.seg: Erik Christiansen, [Coin Hoards 2007. Ancient Hoards.] EEF Hoard of Alexandrian Tetradrachms (CH VII, A27).
Description of a hoard found in about 1900 during excavations by the EEF somewhere in Egypt with no further information about the circumstances of find.
